content: bef ms m1r p1 sms k1 p1 m1l k to mor knitting ds smor chart r smir k to mil smil chart l smol k to 2sts bef mm knitting ds m1r p1 k1 >start with r1 of chart r/l 4sts increase 59sts for back yoke 65sts for front yoke r2-4 r1 >12sts increase 65sts for back yoke 71sts for front yoke r5 smm p1 m1l k to 1st bef ms m1r p1 sms k1 p1 m1l k to mor smor chart r smir m1l k to mil m1r smil chart l smol k to 2sts bef mm m1r p1 k1 >6sts increase 67sts for back yoke 75sts for front yoke 7sts between mir and mil r6-8 r1 >12sts increase 73sts for back yoke 81sts for front yoke r9-12 r5-8 >end with r12 of chart r/l 18sts increase 81sts for back yoke 91sts for front yoke 9sts between mir and mil end soulder increases separate back and front yokes and work back yoke in flat r1 rs rmm k to ms rms place 91 front yoke sts on a holder >81sts for back yoke r2 ws p to end r3 rs k to end r4-29 r2-3 13 times r30 ws r2 place 81 back yoke sts on a holder break yarn join yarn and work front yoke in flat continue chart and front center increases and start sides decreases every 4 row r1 rs place 91 front yoke sts on a needle with rs facing place 1 sleeve st on a holder join yarn k1 ssk k to mor smor chart r smir m1l k to mil m1r smil chart l smol k to 4sts bef end k2to k1 place 1 sleeve st on a holder >start with r1 of chart r/l 89sts for front yoke 11sts between mir and mil 29sts between each end and mor/mol r2 ws p to mol smol chart l smil p to mir smir chart r smor p to end r3 rs k to mor smor chart r smir k to mil smil chart l smol k to end 5 / 8 r4 ws r2 r5 rs k1 ssk k to mor smor chart r smir m1l k to mil m1r smil chart l smol k to 3sts bef end k2to k1 >13sts between mir and mil 28sts between each end and mor/mol r6-8 r2-4 r9-28 r5-8 5 times >23sts between mir and mil 23sts between each end and mor/mol r29 rs r5 >25sts between mir and mil 22sts between each end and mor/mol r30 ws r2 >end with r6 of chart r/l don t break yarn and continue to sec 3 sec 3 body join front and back bodies and work in the round continue chart front center increases and sides decreases every 4 row / on r1 r5 and r9 of chart r1 k to mor smor chart r smir k to mil smil chart l smol k to end pms place 81 back yoke sts on a needle k to end
